basics.name: Fnu Mohbat
basics.Research Interests: Multimedia Models, LLMs and RAG, Computer Vision, NLP, Deep Learning

skills.keywords: Programming Languages: Python, Java, C, C++
Libraries: PyTorch, TensorFlow, Keras, OpenCV, Pillow, NumPy, ROS
Other Tools: Git, LaTeX, Docker, AutoCAD, MATLAB

work.name: Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute
work.summary: Conducting research to enhance Large Language Models (LLMs) and Multi-Modal Models (MMMs) using Knowledge Graphs (KGs) and Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) for food computing applications.

work.name: IBM Thomas J. Watson Research Center
work.summary: Investigated the impact of stable diffusion techniques on manipulating visual concepts within MMMs to produce targeted text such as stories and summaries.

work.name: IBM Thomas J. Watson Research Center
work.summary: Improved generalizstion of visually rich document understanding model by 10-30% by modeling documents as graphs and learning their embeddings using Transformer and Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) for downstream tasks.

work.name: IBM Thomas J. Watson Research Center
work.summary: Developed and trained transformer models and object detection models for document text understanding, focusing on classification and key-value prediction.

work.name: Lahore University of Management Sciences
work.position: Research Associate in National Agriculture Robotics Lab
work.summary: Lead team of 5-10 researchers for developing IoT solutions for water quality monitoring, and improved model compression techniques by reducing model size by 10-30 times.

volunteer.title: Reviewer: ACM International Conference on Information and Knowledge Management (CIKM)
Reviewer: ACM SIGKDD International Conference on Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining (KDD)
Reviewer: European Conference on Computer Vision (ECCV)
Reviewer: IEEE Winter Conference on Applications of Computer Vision (WACV)
Founding member and Vice President, Computer Science Graduate Council at RPI
